page.title: 17THOMPSON'S GRAVE.
page.content: Thompsons Grave is on Berry Hill Lane. It can't be seen cleary because it is surrounded by a wall with only a gate to look through.Charles Thompson was a businessman who spent most of his life abroad. Once,in Lisbon,there was a great earthquake.Churches were torn down and graves upturned revealing bodies.Charles decided that he would be buried 18 feet down,so he could rest in peace. He returned to Mansfield and often walked to the highest point in Mansfield.Charles left money to the Brunts Charity and they later erected a memorial over his grave.
